title: The Story in the Stars
description: GATEWAY TO GANNAH #1The inhabitants of the planet Gannah are known as bloodthirsty savages who once tried to conquer the galaxy. Now a plague has ravaged the planet and only one survivor remains, a young woman named Dassa.Pik, the doctor from the League of Planets assigned to her case, hates everything Gannahan and wishes every last one of its people had died. Bereft of everything sheâ€™s ever known, Dassa clings to her God and the story he has written in the stars. He has given her an to return to Gannah and replenish it with a new race of people.But she must first overcome the prejudice of the entire galaxy and recruit her de facto enemy, Pik, to help her.Praise for The Story in the Stars..."Yvonne Anderson is an amazing talent. Her stories remind me of what I love best about Madeleine L'Engle's writing...depth with subtlety. Yvonne has a fan in me for life."-- Gina Holmes, best-selling author of Crossing Oceans (Tyndale)
author: Yvonne   Anderson
